com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget

Class ScrollBarComponent<S,T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentBase
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.Container<IHorizontalComponent>
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.HorizontalContainer
          • com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget.ScrollBarComponent<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the render state type
    T - the component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IScrollSize, IContainer<IHorizontalComponent>

    public abstract class ScrollBarComponent<S,T extends IComponent>
extends HorizontalContainer
implements IScrollSize
    Composite container containing a scroll component, which can be scrolled using scroll bars.

                          IScrollBarRenderer<S> renderer,
                          IEmptySpaceRenderer<S> cornerRenderer,
                          IEmptySpaceRenderer<S> emptyRenderer)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to be wrapped
        renderer - the renderer to use for the scroll bars
        cornerRenderer - the renderer to use for the corners
        emptyRenderer - the renderer for empty space, if the component is too small
